item.title:
“See this film. It broke me into tiny little pieces. Celine Song is a genius ”
– Paul Mescal raves about PAST LIVES (2023)

item.title: Ethan Hawke celebrates 10 years of The Purge via IG
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Celine Song’s ‘PAST LIVES’ starring Greta Lee, Teo Yoo and John Magaro is one of the best-reviewed movies of 2023.
It currently holds a score of 97% on Rotten Tomatoes and 92% on Metacritic.
